entry.title: Re: Add FranklinCovey Courses to Learning
entry.content: @evanbrough, here you can find a table mentioning if the field is required, along with a description of it: Course (Item) Data Connector File Columns. Templates can be downloaded via the Learning Administration UI (Downloading Learning Connector Templates).

entry.title: Re: Send Dunning Letters to CPI
entry.content:
Define a custom output type in Output Parameter Determination. Use BRFplus rules to trigger this output for dunning documents. Link it to a communication arrangement that sends the payload to CPI (via REST/SOAP). This setup is similar to how outbound delivery documents are routed to CPI in other scenarios.

On the CPI side, you will design an iFlow that accepts the incoming payload (PDF/XML), optionally transforms or enriches it and routes it to your desired destination (e.g., archive, external system, print service)

In short, you need to build the logic as follows

entry.title: Re: prevent administrator from scheduling a class wih an...
entry.content: @user116, the Instructor record could be set to "Inactive" or have its "Security Domain" set to something the Learning Administrator doesn't have access to (in a scenario where permission restrictions are in place). Other than that, I understand it, it'd require an enhancement request (KBA 2090228).

entry.title: Re: Polluted by many questions NOT about SAP Websites in...
entry.content: As of August 2025, I still see many people posting incorrectly to "Questions about SAP Websites". These people will continue to post to any group containing the word "SAP", so that would be great to have one group with the word "SAP" dedicated to people not able or not willing to find an adequate group (to which I wouldn't subscribe), and "Community/KBA", without the word "SAP" (to which I would subscribe).

entry.title: Use Table Order endpoints from SAP Customer Checkout manager api
entry.content:
Hi all,

I want to use some of the table order endpoints availables in the documentation of CCO Manager

However, when I tried to use them (for example GET opentables, GET tableorder, GET tableareas) I get this message: 

{  "errorCode": "214011",  "errorMessage": "User assignment not found"
}

 The user is logged in and has permission allowed on the Table order API

What could be the reason of the error?

Thanks a lot, I appreciate your help.

entry.title: Re: Documentation for DDIC tables of the DRC module
entry.content:
Hello Chris,

Thank you for your explanation! It is good to know that we are correct in identifying table SRF_REP_RUN_DATA as the data source for the DRC transaction data.
However, we have noticed that, for example, the run ID that appears in the URL of the detail view of F1515

isn't stored in this table - where else? - , nor do we know how this table SRF_REP_RUN_DATA of transaction data is linked to the other DRC master data tables.
Is there any information about this?

Best regards, Martin

entry.title: eSocial - Nota Técnica 04/2025: Entrega Concluída e Próximos Passos!
entry.content:
Olá pessoal,

Temos o prazer de anunciar que todos os requisitos da Nota Técnica 04/2025 do eSocial, antes da revisão publicada em 21/08/2025, foram entregues. Esta atualização traz mudanças e melhorias importantes para garantir a conformidade com as mais recentes especificações legais e técnicas. Abaixo, resumimos as principais soluções já disponíveis.

SAP Notes Entregues

Para atender aos requisitos da Nota Técnica 04/2025, as seguintes SAP Notes foram disponibilizadas:

  • SAP Note 3641035: eSocial S-1.3 NT 04/2025 - New wage type natures and absence reasons
  • SAP Note 3644046: eSocial S-1.3 NT 04/2025 - S-1010 - New rule REGRA_VALIDA_CODINCCP_EXC_SEGURADO
  • SAP Note 3645482: Prerequiste objects for SAP Note 3645453
  • SAP Note 3645453: eSocial S-1.3 NT 04/2025 - S-1200, S-2299 and S-2399 - Transformation objects for payroll events

Recomendamos que todos os clientes revisem essas SAP Notes e realizem as atualizações necessárias para garantir total conformidade com os requisitos mais recentes do eSocial.

Principais Soluções Entregues

Validação da Tabela de Tipos de Verbas (SAP Note 3644046)

  • Evento S-1010:
    • Implementada a validação com mensagem de erro para o campo {codIncCP}, conforme a nova regra REGRA_VALIDA_CODINCCP_EXC_SEGURADO.
    • Apenas os valores {codIncCP} [15, 16] são aceitos para naturezas compatíveis com essa situação, conforme especificado na coluna "{codIncCP} no S-1010 = [15, 16]" da Tabela 03 - Natureza das Rubricas da Folha de Pagamento.

Atualizações na Transformação XML (SAP Notes 3645482 e 3645453)

  • O campo notAFT foi inserido na transformação XML para os seguintes eventos:
    • S-1200: Remuneração do trabalhador vinculado ao Regime Geral de Previdência Social
    • S-2299: Desligamento
    • S-2399: Trabalhador sem vínculo - desligamento

Atualizações na Tabela de Especificação de Rubricas Salariais (SAP Note 3641035)

  • Na visão Especificação rubricas salariais acumulação p/subaplicações (V_T596G/SOCN), as seguintes entradas foram inseridas ou atualizadas:
    • 9912: Desconto de assistência médica ou odontológica - Plano diferente de coletivo empresarial (nova)
    • 6129: Outras verbas não remuneratórias (indenizatórias ou multas) (alterada)
    • 9219: Desconto de assistência médica ou odontológica - Plano coletivo empresarial (alterada)

Atualizações no Mapeamento de Códigos para o eSocial (SAP Note 3641035)

  • Na visão Mapeamento de códigos para o eSocial (V_T7BREFDMEVENTS), as seguintes entradas foram inseridas ou atualizadas:
    • 21: Licença não remunerada ou suspensão contratual decorrente de obrigação legal incompatível com a continuação do serviço (alterada)
    • 44: Suspensão contratual decorrente de ajuizamento de reclamação trabalhista pleiteando rescisão indireta do contrato (nova)
    • 45: Suspensão contratual para ajuizamento de inquérito para apuração de falta grave (nova)

Próximos Passos

Com a revisão do governo sobre a Nota Técnica, atualizamos nosso planejamento de entregas. Confira o novo cronograma para se organizar:

Cronograma planejado para a entrega da NT S-1.3 04/2025 (rev) do eSocial:

  • Fase 1 - Entregue!
  • Fase 2 - Revisão da regra REGRA_VALIDA_CODINCCP_EXC_SEGURADO no evento S-1010: 19/09/2025
  • Fase 3 - Revisão das naturezas de rubrica: 17/10/2025

Confira o planejamento completo publicado no Regulatory Change Manager, bem como as SAP Notes já disponíveis.

Reforçamos a importância de revisar as SAP Notes entregues e atualizar seus sistemas para garantir total conformidade com os requisitos mais recentes do eSocial. Nossa equipe está à disposição para apoiar com quaisquer dúvidas ou esclarecimentos adicionais.

Compartilhe este importante aviso com seus colegas e não se esqueça de seguir a tag HCM Payroll Brazil na SAP Community para se manter sempre atualizado.

Fique à vontade para deixar seu feedback, comentário ou pergunta sobre este blogpost no espaço abaixo.

Atenciosamente,

Anderson Marques

Their main points are to understand what’s this SAP login page they see (potentially IAS) and why their access doesn’t work, considering that the answer to the first question is positive (KBA 2325404).

entry.title: OpenText training and certification for SAP resellers
entry.content:
Boost Your Services. Build Customer Trust. Get Certified.

Over half of SAP license and cloud sales involve a trusted partner. With sales growth of more than 27% projected in the coming year, there’s never been a better time to strengthen your offering for 2025/2026.

SAP and OpenText are excited to launch the updated training and certification program for SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by OpenText (also known as OpenText Core Content Management for SAP SuccessFactors ).

Why this matters for you and your customers
If your customers use SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central but lack a fully integrated HR document management solution, you have a perfect opportunity to deliver sustainable, transformational change. With the SaaS solution SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core, you can help your customers:

  • Streamline onboarding and HR processes with automation and workflows.

Provide secure, role-based access to employee files from within SAP SuccessFactors HCM

  • Meet data privacy requirements while ensuring complete employee files with records management
  • Improve HR communications with accurate and personalized employee documents

As SAP’s largest Solution Extension partner, OpenText offers a product that is SAP-tested, validated, and approved—giving your customers confidence in your services. Trained partners can deliver an integrated HR document management platform within weeks, providing your customers with a more compliant solution across the entire hire-to-retire cycle.

Why certification is essential
SAP will only provide full support for configurations implemented by certified partners. Without the badge, you risk delays and limitations in being able to provide the support your customers expect.

When you complete the course and pass the exam, you’ll be equipped to deliver exceptional customer experiences when implementing SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core. Certification will showcase to customers you’re ready.

You can also grow your revenue with expanded services such as advanced document workflows, intelligent capture, AI and API integrations. Explore Standard or Premium individual learning subscriptions.

Get certified today

 Partner certification exam.

  • This is a scheduled 2-hour exam
  • Number for questions:  60
  • Questions format: The test includes question formats such as multiple choice and true/false.
  • Passing Score:  70%
  • Language: English
  • Investment: $500 USD (or your country's currency equivalent, excluding VAT or other taxes)
  • See also Additional Details, including certification validity & renewal and retakes policy information.

Prepare for the certification exam with solution training

If you want to enhance your customer service abilities and get closer to a 100% pass rate, we highly recommend that you enrol in a small group training program.

What you can expect

  • Two days of instructor-led training for SAP resellers (OpenText reseller status is not necessary). 
  • Available in English and German.
  • Investment: $2,400.00 USD (or local currency equivalent, excluding VAT and taxes).

What you’ll gain from the training

  • Live, interactive sessions led by expert trainers
  • Guidance on configuration, integration, and personalization.
  • Tools to deliver targeted, automated communications.
  • Preparation for the certification exam.
  • Promotion of your services through SAP and OpenText reseller channels.

Discover additional learning subscription options to continue your growth journey.

Ready to take the next step?
Register now for the upcoming virtual training session for SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by OpenText. For more details, contact training@opentext.com.

Let’s work together to make every SAP SuccessFactors HCM project a success.

SAP SuccessFactors Document Management Core by Open Text , HCM Employee Self-Service , Partnership ,

entry.title: Re: Whats the difference between SAP S/4HANA Cloud Privat...
entry.content:
Hi @Mambambo 

  1. Which SAP module should you go for?

Since you have strong experience in Receiving, Returns and Inventory functions, the natural fit is:

  • SAP S/4HANA Sourcing and Procurement MM / MM-IM
    • Covers Purchasing, Goods Receipt, Returns and Inventory Management.
    • Direct continuation of your experience as a user, now applied in consulting, configuration, and solutioning.

Suggested certifications:

  • C_TS452 – SAP Certified Application Associate, S/4HANA Sourcing and Procurement.
  • C_S4CPR – SAP Certified Application Associate, S/4HANA Public Cloud Sourcing and Procurement.

If you also touched inventory controlling, stock valuation, or finance postings, a secondary fit could be S/4HANA Finance but Procurement is your best entry point.

 

  1. Here are details to guide you on Public vs Private Edition – S/4HANA Cloud Sourcing & Procurement

Aspect

Public Cloud (SaaS)

Private Cloud (RISE / hosted On-Prem)

Flexibility

Preconfigured Best Practices. Limited customizing (SSCUI). Clean core principle.

Full SPRO customizing like classic ECC. Can enhance with ABAP/Z-dev.

Processes

Standardized processes: Purchase Requisition, PO, GR, Returns, Supplier Invoice, Central Procurement, Ariba integration.

All Public Cloud scope + additional industry-specific processes (e.g., advanced subcontracting, special stocks, BAdI-driven logic).

Extensions

Only via In-App Extensibility (Key User Tools) or BTP Side-by-Side.

Classic ABAP enhancements, user exits, Z-reports, plus BTP.

System Upgrades

Quarterly automatic upgrades by SAP → you must adopt new innovations.

Yearly upgrades, customer-controlled (but still mandatory under RISE).

Target Audience

Companies that want fast deployment, standard processes, low TCO.

Companies needing deep customization, industry processes, or migration from ECC with many Z-developments.

 

  • SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition – Sourcing & Procurement
  • SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition – Sourcing & Procurement

I hope this provides the necessary details. I am happy to help if you have further questions.

Best regards

Chris

entry.title: Re: SAP Build Issues with S/4 HANA Attachments for Controlling Documents
entry.content: For additional information, I'm posting the response from MS Copilot when asked why we cannot see the attachments in SAP GUI / Fiori when using this method on Controlling documents:

entry.title: Re: SAP Build Issues with S/4 HANA Attachments for Controlling Documents
entry.content:
Why Attachments Aren’t Visible in SAP GUI After OData POST

When you attach a document to a BUS2072 object using the OData service (API_CV_ATTACHMENT_SRV), the attachment is stored correctly in the backend. However, the GOS attachment list in SAP GUI may not display it unless certain conditions are met:

✅Common Reasons:

1. GOS Link Not Fully Established:

  •    The OData service may store the document but not create the GOS relationship that the GUI expects.
  •    SAP GUI relies on BINARY_RELATION_CREATE_COMMIT to establish the link between the business object and the attachment.

2. Missing Object Folder Initialization:

  •   The GUI may not initialize the object folder until a manual attachment is created.
  •    This triggers the creation of the object folder structure in the GOS framework.

3.  Attachment Category or Class Not Set Properly:

   If the attachment is stored under a category not recognized by GOS, it won’t appear in the GUI list.

✅Solution: Trigger GOS Link Programmatically

To make attachments visible in SAP GUI without manual creation, you should:

1.  Use BINARY_RELATION_CREATE_COMMIT:

  •    This function module creates the necessary link between the BUS2072 object and the attachment.
  •    It ensures the attachment appears in the GOS list in SAP GUI.

2.  Ensure the linkedSAPObjectKey is correctly formatted:

  •    For BUS2072, this includes:
  •      KOKRS (Controlling Area)
  •      BELNR (Document Number, padded to 10 digits)
  •      GJAHR (Fiscal Year)  (in our implementation, we do not use GJAHR as part of the linkedSAPObjectKey)

3.  Use SO_DOCUMENT_INSERT_API1 if you need to create the document first.

entry.title: Re: SAP analytics cloud Plannung
entry.content:
Hi @mahadev_9 

This behaviour is quite common in Fiori Elements apps or custom SAPUI5 apps in S/4HANA Cloud when using the onInitialization page event with custom filter logic.

Here is why the table refreshes twice

  1. Default behaviour in Fiori Elements
    • When a List Report or Object Page loads, the framework automatically executes an initial read of the table.
    • Your onInitialization script runs at the same time, which applies filters again → causing a second refresh.
  2. Lifecycle of events
    • onInit / onInitialization → runs before the Smart Table/Smart Filter has completed binding.
    • Then the Fiori Elements internal handler triggers a standard rebindTable event, effectively refreshing again.

How you can avoid the double refresh

There are a few approaches you can take:

  1. Move logic to onBeforeRebindTable instead of onInitialization
    • This event runs right before the table executes its OData call.
  2. Disable automatic search on initialization (if applicable)
    • In Fiori Elements List Report, set: "defaultFilterMode": "manual"
    • This prevents the automatic OData call on first load; the table only refreshes after your script applies the filter.
  3. Guard your filter logic
    • Add a flag so that your onInitialization code only executes once and does not trigger another refresh unnecessarily.

Extending List Report Apps

 

I hope this provides the necessary details. I am happy to help if you have further questions.

Best regards

Chris

entry.title: Event Summary: SAP Inside Track Hyderabad 2024 (2nd Edition)
entry.content:
SAP Inside Track Hyderabad 2024 (2nd Edition) was a full-day event packed with technical sessions and strategic insights from various  speakers. The event's content provided a comprehensive look at the latest advancements in SAP, with a strong emphasis on the intersection of S/4HANA, AI, and Analytics.

Event Highlights & Lowlights

Highlights:

  • 900 Registrations: The event saw a massive number of registrations, indicating strong interest and engagement from the SAP community.
  • 10 Speakers: A total of 10 speakers shared their knowledge and insights on various SAP-related topics, providing a wide range of expertise.
  • MOURI Tech Stall: MOURI Tech had a prominent stall at the event, which served as a key point for networking and interaction.

Lowlights:

  • 10% Turnaround: Despite the high number of registrations, the event had a 10% turnaround, which indicates a significant number of registered attendees did not show up.
  • Event T-Shirt Arrived After the Event: A notable logistical issue was that the event T-shirts were not available for attendees on the day of the event and were delivered afterward.

The Event started with the panel discussion:

FROM TRANSACTIONAL TO PREDICTIVE: THE S/4HANA AND AI SYNERGY

  • DR. MAHESH KUMAR CV Founding Member, Global Agentic AI Consortium
  • GUPTA KANDULA AVP, HCLTech
  • RASHMI JOSHI Technical Solution Architect, IBM
  • SUNIL KUMAR NAVYA Senior Director, MOURI Tech

 This high-level panel, a key highlight of the event, delved into how S/4HANA's transactional data and AI/ML capabilities combine to deliver predictive analytics. The discussion emphasized the shift from merely reporting on past events to anticipating future outcomes.

  • Immanuel Kolagani (MOURI Tech): The Open Era of SAP Analytics - Datasphere and BDC :Immanuel's session focused on SAP Datasphere and the Business Data Catalog (BDC). He explained how these tools represent SAP's commitment to an open data strategy, allowing for seamless integration and management of data from various sources to enable a unified analytics landscape.
  • Srinivas Reddy Edulakanti (Patil Group): SAP Transformation Journey Challenges :  This talk provided a candid look at the real-world challenges organizations face during their SAP transformation projects. Srinivas shared insights on overcoming common hurdles, from technical complexities to change management issues, offering practical advice for a smoother journey.
  • Dr. Mahesh Kumar CV (Al Bharath Consortium): How to Reskill in the age of S4HANA, Embedded Analytics, AI...SAP BDC :  Dr. Kumar's session was a crucial guide for professionals looking to stay relevant in the rapidly evolving SAP landscape. He outlined the key skills needed for the future, emphasizing the importance of expertise in S/4HANA, embedded analytics, AI, and SAP BTP.
  • Naga Prathima Mummidisetti (MOURI Tech): Unifying the Cloud: Harnessing SAP BTP Integration Suite for a Connected Enterprise : This talk provided a deep dive into the SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP), specifically focusing on its Integration Suite. Naga Prathima explained how organizations can use BTP to seamlessly connect disparate systems, both SAP and non-SAP, to create a cohesive and data-rich landscape essential for modern business operations.
  • Vidya Sagar Yedla (MOURI Tech): Building Modern Apps with RAP and CAP: A Developer's Journey Aimed at developers, this session was a practical guide to building modern, cloud-native applications on SAP BTP. Vidya Sagar demonstrated the use of the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model (RAP) and the Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP) to create flexible and scalable applications that extend the functionality of S/4HANA.
  • Hitendra Munjampally (MOURI Tech): Rise of ERP Copilots: AI Assistants Transforming Enterprise Productivity :  Hitendra's session explored the growing trend of AI copilots within ERP systems. He demonstrated how tools like SAP Joule can act as intelligent assistants, streamlining workflows, automating routine tasks, and providing users with actionable insights directly within their SAP interface.
  • Madhavi Arelli (SRIA Infotech): SAP AI in Transform Business with AI Agents, and Smarter Models : Madhavi’s session provided a broad overview of how AI and intelligent models can fundamentally transform business processes. She presented various case studies demonstrating how AI agents can optimize operations, improve decision-making, and create new business models.
  • Vinod Kumar Reddy Komma (MOURI Tech): AI-Powered SAP: Where to Begin and What to Expec: Vinod's talk served as a guide for organizations new to integrating AI with SAP. He outlined the starting points, necessary prerequisites, and a realistic roadmap for adopting AI, setting expectations for the benefits and challenges of the journey.
  • Mrinalini KR (ToggleNow): From Reactive to Predictive: AI-Driven SAP Auditing : Mrinalini's talk addressed the evolution of auditing within the SAP environment. She demonstrated how AI can move auditing from a reactive, post-event process to a predictive one, using machine learning to identify anomalies and potential fraud risks in real-time.
  • Sudhakar Nagadevara (MOURI Tech): Beyond Development: Business AI + Joule Driving the Intelligent Enterprise:  This session shifted the focus from technical development to the business impact of AI. Sudhakar explored how the combination of business AI applications and SAP's AI copilot, Joule, enables users at all levels to become more productive and contributes to the overall intelligent enterprise strategy.
  • Subbu Sravan Mulumudi (ToggleNow): Gen AI Agents for SAP GRC ; Summary: A specialized topic, this session highlighted the use of Generative AI agents to enhance SAP Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC). Subbu Sravan showcased how these agents can assist in creating and managing compliance rules, simulating risk scenarios, and improving audit readiness.

Finally event ended with the group photo.

entry.title: पेटीएम से पैसे वापस कैसे पाए अगर गलत ट्रांजेक्शन ह
entry.content: पेटीएम से पैसे वापस कैसे पाए अगर गलत ट्रांजेक्शन हो जाए? इसके लिए आपको `pay Tm™ टोल फ्री पेटीएम ग्राहक सेवा नंबर 00-7070~869√923 पर कॉल करना होगा। पेटीएम से पैसे कैसे वापस पाएं. इसके लिए आपको `PAY tm™ टोल फ्री नंबर (07070~869✓923) पर कॉल करना होगा।

entry.title: Re: sap calm custom fields
entry.content:
Hi @jerrysam 

Yes, in SAP Cloud Application Lifecycle Management you can create custom fields for objects such as Requirements, Tasks, Test Cases, Defects, and Features, but there are some constraints compared to on-premise ALM.

Here are current Capabilities

  • Custom Fields & Logic app is not available in Cloud ALM it is only in S/4HANA.
  • Instead, Cloud ALM has its own In App Extensibility for certain work items.
  • For Requirements, Tasks, Test Cases, User Stories, and Features, you can:
    • Add Custom Fields via Administration → Custom Fields.
    • Decide where they are visible for example in details UI, filters, reports.
    • Use them for tracking, filtering, and reporting.

Here are steps to achieve that

  1. Go to Cloud ALM → Administration → Custom Fields.
  2. Select the Entity Type like Requirement, Task, Test Case, etc.
  3. Create a new Custom Field.
  4. Assign it to the relevant UI.
  5. Save and activate → The field is now available for project teams.

 

I hope this provides the necessary details. I am happy to help if you have further questions.

Best regards

Chris

Custom Fields in SAP Cloud ALM

Extending SAP Cloud ALM with Custom Fields

entry.title: Efficient Data Management: Data Governance APJ
entry.content:
Join SAP experts and fellow customers to explore steps for establishing robust data governance that transforms data into a strategic asset—driving smarter decisions and enabling growth through big data. 

Register Here

Details

 

Steps to establish robust data governance to maximize the value of data as a strategic asset, driving better decision-making and leveraging big data for organizational growth and success

 

Overview

Managing a data governance framework can feel like taming an unruly beast. Multiple data sources, siloed teams, and unclear governance lead to confusion and risks. Take back control with proven Data Governance Transformation Programs. Introducing 1:Few Sessions for SAP SuccessFactors customers.

In this interactive webinar, Data Governance SAP expert and Transformation Advisor Nicole Wright will share real-world examples and leading practices, providing an opportunity for customers to collaborate, share insights, and learn from colleagues in other organizations.

Each month we will alternate with the two topics 

Introduction of Data Governance

Introduction to HR Data Catalog

 

Why should you attend?

 

In these interactive sessions, SAP SuccessFactors customers will network and gain insights to tame their data governance frameworks. Attendees will also have the opportunity to exchange ideas and experiences in an open peer-to-peer format, strengthening their ability to manage data as a strategic asset and ensure compliance, security, and accuracy across their HR tech ecosystems.

 

We will talk about:

Relevant programs to be successful at your transformation

•Data Management Strategy

•Data Governance

•Data Governance Charter

•Operating Framework and Responsibilities

•Plan for Operational Success and HR Data Catalogue

•HR Data Governance

•Data Governance Roadmap

•Data Governance and AI

entry.title: Re: Visibility of data submitted with guest interaction
entry.content:
Hi Wittek,

If OTP verification is required, e.g. the submitted data is not allowed by the guest schema, the data is not stored anywhere until the user verify his email.

Note that unauthenticated interaction can be done when the account already exist and it can override existing data, hence this verification must happen before the account being updated.

entry.title: Managing Continuous Change APJ
entry.content:
Register Here

Overview

Creating a successful change management strategy requires addressing key business considerations and decisions that align all stakeholders with a unified vision. By collaborating on this process, you can develop your initial program documentation while identifying any gaps and areas needing further exploration.

 

Join us for an interactive webinar where Transformation Advisor Nicole Wright and SAP Change Manager Eliza Semmler will share real-world examples and leading practices from various industries. This is a unique opportunity to engage with peers, ask questions, and learn from the experiences of professionals across different organizations

 

Who Should Attend

HR and IT Business Leads

Project Sponsors

Change Manager

Project Manager

Super Administrators

HR and IT Functional Leads

SME

 

We will talk about

Program Design

Persona Development 

Communication 

Training Planning 

Sustainment & Reinforcement

Moving to a Skills based Organisation

entry.title: Gpay में गलत खाते में ट्रांसफर किए गए पैसे वापस कैसे पाएं?
entry.content: गूगल पे से गलत अकाउंट में पैसे ट्रांसफर हो गए हैं, उन्हें वापस पाने के लिए क्या करे? गूगल पे के कस्टमर केयर Number 00,9122⟩88-7884-// या पर कॉल करें. पे से गलत अकाउंट में पैसे ट्रांसफर हो गए हैं, उन्हें वापस पाने के लिए यानी अगर गूगल पे से गलत पेमेंट हो गई है तो पहले गूगल पे से शिकायत करें.
